original_metadata.paper_title: FinGPT: Enhancing Sentiment-Based Stock Movement Prediction with Dissemination-Aware and Context-Enriched LLMs
original_metadata.table_caption: Table 1:Our methods show a significant increase in the binary accuracy. Also, the increase in “long-term” word frequency and “short-term” word frequency provides evidence for attention to temporal aspects, which may account for the accuracy improvement.
